title: Age of Empires IV – Patch 13.1.4420
description: Greetings, Age of Empires IV community! After rolling out the Knights of Cross and Rose expansion and a hotfix patch for 13.0 (read here for more info), we are pretty happy with where things are at. However, as we all know, there is always room for improvement! We’re back with some bugfixes, gameplay tweaks, and … Continued

title: Pre-order Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition on PlayStation 5!
description: Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition celebrates the 25th anniversary of one of the most popular strategy games ever, and is now coming to PlayStation 5. Experience stunning 4K Ultra HD graphics, a fully remastered soundtrack, and three expansions now included with the base game: Lords of the West, Dynasties of India, and Dawn of … Continued

title: Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition – Update 141935
description: Welcome to THE exciting update for Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition! We’ve decided the legendarily long patch notes weren’t long enough already, and have decided to include even more changes! You can view these addition changes below. title: FAQ – The Three Kingdoms DLC & PlayStation 5
description: What Are the Three Kingdoms? The Three Kingdoms era, spanning from 220 to 280 AD, represents a pivotal chapter in Chinese history and culture. Emerging from the collapse of the Han Dynasty, which had been weakened by internal strife and corruption, this period saw the division of China into three rival states: Wei, Shu, and … Continued

title: Pre-Order Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition – The Three Kingdoms
description: We are thrilled to announce the next DLC for Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition – The Three Kingdoms, a riveting and holistic expansion, coming May 6th! Dive into China’s epic Romance of the Three Kingdoms, where history and legend collide in a battle for supremacy. The Three Kingdoms introduces five fascinating new civilizations, each … Continued
